string.value: #b#@1092001:##k in #b#m120000300##k says she needs your help.

She wants you to eliminate 30 #rPigs#k that have been ramming into and damaging the ship. They can be easily found in #b#m100030000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1092001:##k in #b#m120000300##k upon completion.
You have eliminated 30 of the #rPigs#k that have been destroying the ship!

I'm so tired. I keep repairing my ship, but it's never-ending! It keeps leaking!
This is all because of those #rPigs#k. They keep ramming into my ship, puncturing through the stern of my ship!

Could you help me?
It's nothing too major. Could you simply eliminate 30 #rPigs#k that keep ramming into my ship?\nYou'll be able to find a lot of them in #b#m100030000##k!
I'm no Joan of Arc… but I'll sacrifice myself for The Nautilus.
Have you gotten rid of all the #rPigs#k? I don't hear the banging outside anymore.
Woohoo! I can finally rest tonight, thanks to you!
You haven't hunted 30 #rPigs#k yet? No? I'm tired…
